name: unitss
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cui, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (hs0 ∈ c0 → hs0 ∈ c1)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ c0 =(Unit ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cui, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ⊆ c1
⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs0, c1)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ c0 =(Unit ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cui, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ⊆ c1
⊣ d(hs0, c1)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ c0 =(Unit ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cui, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ⊆ c1
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ c0 =(Unit ` c2)

comment: The set of units is contained in the base set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
